title: League Client Crashing When I Try To Pay for RP (Mac)
body:
Hello everyone

So in this recent patch (6.17), when I try to buy RP, my client crashes. I can open the store and click on the amount of RP I want to get, but when I try and choose Visa, Mastercard, etc. The client crashes.

I've already tried repairing the client, what should I do?

replies.body: Are you using any third parties currently?  Some apps like play.tv and overwolf have been causing the client to crash for some players, so removing those would be a solid first step.  If your issue continues, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this for you individually.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!

Well I filed a support ticket, and got pretty quick feedback, so thank you! Turns out all I needed was an update on my system, and now I'm able to purchase RP again and throw my money at league haha~ Thanks again for your help!!
I've had this same problem (also on mac) for a while now, since I believe it was June (whenever the your shop thing was) it's very frustrating
